org.sd.util.fsm
Interface FsmBuilder<T>

All Known Implementing Classes:
BaseFsmBuilder, FsmBuilder1, FsmBuilder2
public interface FsmBuilder<T>

Utility class to build an FSM grammar from input.

Author:
Spence Koehler

Method Detail

add

void add(T token)

getMatcher

FsmMatcher<T> getMatcher(FsmMatcher.Mode mode)
Get a matcher for this builder's (current) sequences.

NOTE: A new instance of a matcher will be built on each invocation and the returned matcher will always be based on the current state of this builder.

getSequences

java.util.List<FsmSequence<T>> getSequences(boolean keepAll)
Get the (collapsed) sequences.
